# mysql数据库，测试mvp常用语句

### 1、 删除表中数据

```mysql
delete from USER_TASK;
delete from IMG_INFO;
delete from TASK_IMG_REL;


delete from IMG_INS_INFO;
delete from LAB_CLASS;

# DL接口表，DL请求参数表（竖表），DL请求参数子表（坚表）
delete from DL_INTERFACE;
delete from DL_PARAM_INFO;
delete from DL_REQ_PARAM;
delete from DL_MODEL_INFO;
```

### 2、读取表中数据

```mysql
# 查看全部数据
select * from USER_TASK;
select * from IMG_INFO;
select * from TASK_IMG_REL order by ORDER_ID;

# 查看 逻辑删除的数据
select * from IMG_INFO where IS_DEL=1;
select * from TASK_IMG_REL where IS_DEL=1;

# 任务表，DL模型表，任务和DL模型的关系表
select * from USER_TASK;
select * from DL_INTERFACE where TASK_ID=2018072122655062968 order by CREATE_TIME;
select * from DL_MODEL_INFO where TASK_ID=2018072122655062968;

# DL接口表，DL请求参数表（竖表），DL请求参数子表（坚表）
select * from DL_INTERFACE;
select * from DL_PARAM_INFO\G;
select * from DL_REQ_PARAM;
select * from DL_MODEL_INFO;
```

### 3、标签类插入数据
```mysql
# 标签类
insert into LAB_CLASS(LAB_CLASS_ID,LAB_CLASS_NAME,IS_DEL)
values(1,'标签类1',0),
(2,'标签类2',0),
(3,'标签类3',0);

# 任务标签类关系
insert into TASK_CLASS_REL(TASK_ID,LAB_CLASS_ID,ORDER_ID)
values(2018072122655062968,1,1),
(2018072122655062968,2,2),
(2018072122655062968,3,3);

# 标注实例
insert into IMG_INS_INFO(INS_ID,LAB_CLASS_ID,IMG_ID,LAB_BATCH,STATE)
values(2018072110000000001,1,2018072194413399910,1,1),
(2018072110000000002,1,2018072121443642469,1,1),
(2018072110000000003,1,2018072123297023737,1,1),
(2018072110000000004,2,2018072117557269672,1,1),
(2018072110000000005,2,2018072188994134644,1,1),
(2018072110000000006,2,2018072188969605635,1,1),
(2018072110000000007,3,2018072166516400238,1,1),
(2018072110000000008,3,2018072161167793849,1,1),
(2018072110000000009,3,2018072160695105717,1,1),
(2018072110000000010,3,2018072132919507161,1,1);

# 标注记录
insert into IMG_LAB_INFO(IMG_ID,LAB_BATCH,DL_REQ_MSG,STATE)
values(2018072194413399910,1,"[[2018072110000000001, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072121443642469,1,"[[2018072110000000002, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072123297023737,1,"[[2018072110000000003, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072117557269672,1,"[[2018072110000000004, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072188994134644,1,"[[2018072110000000005, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072188969605635,1,"[[2018072110000000006, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072166516400238,1,"[[2018072110000000007, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072161167793849,1,"[[2018072110000000008, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072160695105717,1,"[[2018072110000000009, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1),
(2018072132919507161,1,"[[2018072110000000010, 65, 62, 1, 5, [0, 5]]]",1);

# 图像标注结果
insert into IMG_LAB_RESULT(LABELED_IMG_ID,Mongo_ID,IMG_ID,IS_DL,IS_DEL)
values(2018072120000000001,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b24",2018072194413399910,0,0),
(2018072120000000002,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b01",2018072121443642469,0,0),
(2018072120000000003,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b02",2018072123297023737,0,0),
(2018072120000000004,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b03",2018072117557269672,0,0),
(2018072120000000005,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b04",2018072188994134644,0,0),
(2018072120000000006,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b05",2018072188969605635,0,0),
(2018072120000000007,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b06",2018072166516400238,0,0),
(2018072120000000008,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b07",2018072161167793849,0,0),
(2018072120000000009,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b08",2018072160695105717,0,0),
(2018072120000000010,"5b52d1c0e63610b1f9237b09",2018072132919507161,0,0);

```
